about_the_game:
Affliction

Role Playing Game DLC:
  • Continue To Play The Game - Without Needing A Computer And With Friends!
  • Role Playing Rulebook - Play The Game In A Roleplaying Manner! (Similar To Other Tabletop Role Playing Games)
  • A Guide That Covers All You Need To Play The Game As A Roleplaying Game!
  • All Files Are In Text Format For Easy Access And Easy Personalization!
  • Freely Modify Any Of The Rules So You Can Play How You Want!

NOTE: This DLC is for home use only. It has no immediate effects in game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 400 series or AMD Radeon HD 6000 series, 1GB Video Card (Minimum Shader Model 2.0)
  • Storage: 50 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: File is in text format

short_description: Affliction Role Playing Game DLC: This DLC includes all the necessary files to play Affliction as a role playing game with all your friends like other similar tabletop role playing games.
